attributes.action: Legalisation of recreational use of Cannabis
attributes.additional_details: We as the UK cannabis community need our herb legalised as the prescriptions are still not on the NHS and readily available, you people in power need to recognise how cannabis helps people, there should no longer be a bad light shown on cannabis. I mean for God's sake Elizabeth I made it mandatory to grow hemp, why is it now illegal.
attributes.background: We want the Government and Parliament to reconsider the law on cannabis, as we have a thriving medical scene, I hope the United Kingdom can follow Germany in their recent legalisation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655029
